default.name: Unknown Error
default.desc: The server experienced an error and could not retrieve information for it. Please try again or contact the site administrator for assistance.

404.name: File Not Found
404.desc: The file/document you were looking for was not found on the server. Please try again or contact the site administrator for assistance.

500.name: Internal Server Error
500.desc: The server experienced an internal error when trying to reach the file/document. Please try again or contact the site administrator for assistance.
